string-array.name: brainstorming
string-array.item: Leaving Kickoff, the first thing your team should begin doing is brainstorming. No idea is a bad idea here, and this is the time to come up with all kinds of crazy designs. During this time you should begin planning strategy and deciding how and what you want your robot to do.

string-array.name: approaching_the_game
string-array.item: Before thinking about how your robot could accomplish the game, it is important for you to decide what you want to accomplish! You\'ll need a game-plan before you can design a robot. In order to design a robot around the best strategy, KING TeC stages a mock game using human players instead of robots immediately after Kickoff, revealing any strategies that may otherwise be overlooked.

string-array.name: game_rules
string-array.item: Fully understanding the rules of the new game is critical to the design process. Everyone on the team should read the rules at least once and your team should appoint a Rules Master, someone who your team can defer to for all rules-related questions.
